title: The Mystery of the Midnight Murder
description: 11-year old Ayaz Hussein is a rag picker. He lives in a slum in Kolkata. One night Ayaz gets up, steps out of the house, and goes towards the public toilet. On the way, suddenly, he witnesses a man being murdered. He lets out a cry. The killer looks up and sees the boy. A terrified Ayaz runs out of the slum. The killer gives chase, but somehow Ayaz manages to escape. This is the story of how Ayaz's life changes completely following the murder. He becomes a student in a night school, and studies under a street light every night. The family is too poor to afford electricity. A priest becomes a mentor to Ayaz, while the school durwan becomes a friend. And, all along, there is a murder mystery that is solved only at the very end.
author: Shevlin Sebastian
